snippet.title: Saturn Longplay [035] Steam Heart's (Censored for YT)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org - Uncensored download here!

Played by: Mad-Matt

Steam-Heart's is an erotic vertical shooter game developed by GIGA and initially released by TGL for the PC98 platform in 1994. It later made its way to the PC Engine Super CD-ROM and then the Sega Saturn. The game features action mixed with adult content, as well as a two-player mode. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
